name: Rocket League
notes: You'll need to run BakkesMod.exe manually every time you launch Rocket League. BakkesMod GUI doesn't open but works otherwise. Warning: Crashes when using D9VK. We don't reccommend you play competitive currently.

task.description: Please select RocketLeague.exe through the setup prompt to install BakkesMod.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- d9vk: https://github.com/Joshua-Ashton/d9vk/releases/download/0.12/d9vk-0.12.tar.gz
- bakke: http://bakkesmod.com/static/BakkesModInjector.zip
game:
  appid: 252950
  arch: win32
  nolaunch: true
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: bakke
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/d9vk-0.12/
    file: d9vk
- move:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-0.12/
    src: $CACHE/d9vk-0.12/
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Please select RocketLeague.exe through the setup prompt to install
      BakkesMod.
    executable: $GAMEDIR/BakkesMod.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: ShowDotFiles
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
winesteam:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1920x1080
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-0.12
  version: tkg-3.21-x86_64
